TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Chishang, title = Chishang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chishang} }

S.FORM: Chishang (Ikekami go, 池上鄉) mki sku Taitung. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 79.23 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 12.44 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 1.05 km²), 7,640 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 2,901 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 2,162 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 28%. kwara sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Amis ku smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. sinpngan sehu s'uli sku sahuy go. ays ptyaw sebu Chishang ays psgayun 8 ru 9 alang. 9 alang hani ga, Kalokapuk , Muliyaw , Cikowa'ay , Dihekoay , Ciataw , Cipuwa , Fangafangasan , Kawaliwali , Cicala'ay . kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan

Chishang (Ikekami go, 池上鄉) mki sko Taitong. so'onon kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 79.23 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 12.44 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 1.05 km²), 7,640 hi ko so'onon kwara alang hi kya, 2,901 bowan ko kwarakya, tiko sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga 2,162 hi, kyala kwara pinspong s'oli ga 28%. kwara sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga Taywang Gyencomin na Amis ko smrrho ko pyox s'oli taya kya. sinpngan seho s'oli sko sahoy go. ays ptyaw sebo Chishang ays psgayon 8 ro 9 alang. 9 alang hani ga, Kalokapok , Moliyaw , Cikowa'ay , Dihekoay , Ciataw , Cipowa , Fangafangasan , Kawaliwali , Cicala'ay . kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan
